Someone close to Mike Pence explains that the people closest to him, the friends and people he knew best from Indiana, wanted to see him come back to Indiana. By contrast,`` the support for him to run nationally was in large part from leaders of the national conservative movement''- who perhaps didn't have the same sway as his longtime supporters. the legendary heavyweight champion Mohammed Ali and Secretary of State Colin Powell . Tony first showed an interest in becoming a broadcast journalist at the tender age of 5. His mother remembers him watching the news and saying This is Tony Smith with the 6 o'clock news. Tony was born in Chicago and is a graduate of Barry University in Miami. Tony spends his free time watching movies, enjoying the great outdoors and swimming. He lives in the Aksarben Village area.
